SEARCH
Package Server

Class ModelListener

java.lang.Object
Server.ModelListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
MockModelListener
public class ModelListener extends Object
The type Model listener. This class is responsible for sending notifications to the players about the changes in the game state

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ModelListener(ServerAPI_GO serverAPI)
    Instantiates a new Model listener.

    • notifyChanges

      public void notifyChanges(PlayableDeck goldDeck, PlayableDeck resourceDeck, List<PlayableCard> openGold, List<PlayableCard> openResource, ArrayList<String> players, String gameId, ObjectiveCard commonObjective1, ObjectiveCard commonObjective2)

      Parameters:
      goldDeck - the gold deck
      resourceDeck - the resource deck
      openGold - the open gold
      openResource - the open resource
      players - the players
      gameId - the game id

      commonObjective2 - the common objective 2

    • notifyChanges

      public void notifyChanges(PlayableDeck goldDeck, PlayableDeck resourceDeck, List<PlayableCard> openGold, List<PlayableCard> openResource, ArrayList<String> players, String gameId, ObjectiveCard commonObjective1, ObjectiveCard commonObjective2, String playerID)
      Notification with data about the order of the cards in decks sent to a single player, used when a player reconnects
      Parameters:
      goldDeck - the gold deck
      resourceDeck - the resource deck
      openGold - the open gold
      openResource - the open resource
      players - the players
      gameId - the game id
      commonObjective1 - the common objective 1
      commonObjective2 - the common objective 2
      playerID - the receiver player id

    • notifyChanges

      public void notifyChanges(String player, Pawn pawnColor, String reconnectedPlayer)
      Sends the player pawn color to a specific player, used when a player reconnects
      Parameters:
      player - the player
      pawnColor - the pawn color
      reconnectedPlayer - the reconnected player (the one that needs to be notified)

    • notifyChanges

      Parameters:
      starterCard - the starter card
      player - the player
      pawnColor - the pawn color

    • notifyChanges

      after each player chooses his secretObjective, a notification is sent
      Parameters:
      secretObjective - the secret objective
      player - the player

    • notifyChanges

      public void notifyChanges(String player, List<Coordinates> availablePlaces, boolean[] canBePlaced)
      At the beginning of the turn of turnPlayer, the model notifies the player about which cards of his hand can be placed(due to placementConstraint) and also where the cards can be placed
      Parameters:
      player - the player
      availablePlaces - the available places
      canBePlaced - true if the card can be placed face side, false otherwise

    • notifyChanges

      public void notifyChanges(String player, HashMap<Coordinates,PlayableCard> disposition, List<Coordinates> availablePlaces, int points)
      after placing the card each player is notified with his update disposition, points, elements and artifacts
      Parameters:
      player - the player
      disposition - the disposition
      availablePlaces - the available places
      points - the points

    • notifyChanges

      public void notifyChanges(String player, HashMap<Coordinates,PlayableCard> disposition, List<Coordinates> availablePlaces, int points, String recipient)
      after placing the card the reconnected player is notified with his update disposition, points, elements and artifacts, used when a player reconnects
      Parameters:
      player - the player
      disposition - the disposition
      availablePlaces - the available places
      points - the points
      recipient - the recipient

    • notifyChanges

      public void notifyChanges(String player, HashMap<Artifact,Integer> availableArtifacts, HashMap<Element,Integer> availableElements)
      we update the player resources(elements, artifacts)
      Parameters:
      player - the player
      availableArtifacts - the available artifacts
      availableElements - the available elements

    • personalNotifyChanges

      public void personalNotifyChanges(String player, HashMap<Artifact,Integer> availableArtifacts, HashMap<Element,Integer> availableElements)
      we update the player resources(elements, artifacts) NOT IN BROADCAST, used when a player reconnects
      Parameters:
      player - the player
      availableArtifacts - the available artifacts
      availableElements - the available elements

    • notifyChanges

      public void notifyChanges(List<PlayableCard> deck, int cardSource)
      After the player decided where to draw the next card from, the involved card source gets updated based on cardSource
      Parameters:
      deck - the deck from which the card is drawn
      cardSource - the card source

    • notifyChanges

      public void notifyChanges(List<PlayableCard> deck, int cardSource, int index)
      after the player decided where to draw the next card from, the involved card source gets updated based on cardSource method used when picking a card from an "open card" deck
      Parameters:
      deck - the deck
      cardSource - the card source
      index - the index

    • notifyChanges

      public void notifyChanges(HashMap<String,Integer> finalPoints, ArrayList<String> winners)
      at the end of the game each player is notified with the final points of every player, the view is responsible for displaying the winner
      Parameters:
      finalPoints - a hashmap containing the players' names and their points
      winners - the winners

    • notifyChanges

      public void notifyChanges(String player, CantPlaceCardException e)
      notify a player when can't play a card
      Parameters:
      player - the player's nickname
      e - the raised exception by the controller

    • notifyChanges

      public boolean notifyChanges(String player, KickOutOfGameException e)
      notifies a player when he is kicked out of the game or exits it
      Parameters:
      player - the player's nickname
      e - the raised exception
      Returns:
      true if the message is correctly delivered, else false

    • notifyChanges

      public void notifyChanges(String player, EmptyCardSourceException e)
      notify a player when can't draw from a deck
      Parameters:
      player - the player's nickname
      e - the raised exception

    • notifyReconnection

      public void notifyReconnection(String playerID)
      Notifies when the reconnection of a player correctly happens.
      Parameters:
      playerID - the player id

      Parameters:
      playerID - the player id
      starterCard - the starter card
      color - the color of the pawn for the player
